MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G62 and G63 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Milndavie Road and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:12pm due to reports of a grounded overhead line near Lower Craigallian and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:28pm on Sunday, 07 March 2021
